name: MicroJS
body:
# MicroJS
I make small javascript snippets for small things. You could download the gzipped file which contains all of them.
***
### Clockjs
![ClockJS](http://samad@samad.qs-solutions.com/Images/ClockJS.PNG)
This is a javascript snippet which shows a clock. Only you need to give an ID of 'clock' to an element and it becomes a clock.
More stuff will be added later.
**Version 1.0**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
